SUR_S2.name: SUR_S2
SUR_S2.description: Secure user read access control for the second slave

enumeratedValues.description: The secure user read access is disabled for the second slave.

enumeratedValues.name: SUR_S2_1
enumeratedValues.description: The secure user read access is enabled for the second slave.

LOCK_S2.name: LOCK_S2
LOCK_S2.description: The lock bit corresponding to the second slave. It is written by the secure software.

enumeratedValues.name: LOCK_S2_0
enumeratedValues.description: Not locked. Bits 7-0 can be written by the software.

enumeratedValues.name: LOCK_S2_1
enumeratedValues.description: Bits 7-0 are locked and cannot be written by the software

LOCK_S1.name: LOCK_S1
LOCK_S1.description: The lock bit corresponding to the first slave. It is written by the secure software.

enumeratedValues.name: LOCK_S1_0
enumeratedValues.description: Not locked. The bits 16-23 can be written by the software.

enumeratedValues.name: LOCK_S1_1
enumeratedValues.description: The bits 16-23 are locked and can't be written by the software.

HP_DMA.name: HP_DMA
HP_DMA.description: Determines whether the register value of the corresponding HP field is passed as the hprot[1] of the eDMA

enumeratedValues.name: HP_DMA_0
enumeratedValues.description: The hprot1 input signal value is routed to the csu_hprot1 output for the corresponding master.

enumeratedValues.name: HP_DMA_1
enumeratedValues.description: The HP register bit is routed to the csu_hprot1 output for the corresponding master.

L_DMA.name: L_DMA
L_DMA.description: Lock bit set by the TZ software for the eDMA

enumeratedValues.name: L_DMA_0
enumeratedValues.description: No lock-the adjacent (next lower) bit can be written by the software.

enumeratedValues.name: L_DMA_1
enumeratedValues.description: Lock-the adjacent (next lower) bit can't be written by the software.

HPC_USDHC1.description: Indicates the privilege/user mode for the USDHC1

enumeratedValues.name: HPC_USDHC1_0
enumeratedValues.description: User mode for the corresponding master

enumeratedValues.name: HPC_USDHC1_1
enumeratedValues.description: Supervisor mode for the corresponding master

L_USDHC1.name: L_USDHC1
L_USDHC1.description: Lock bit set by the TZ software for the USDHC1

enumeratedValues.name: L_USDHC1_0
enumeratedValues.description: No lock-the adjacent (next lower) bit can be written by the software.

enumeratedValues.name: L_USDHC1_1
enumeratedValues.description: Lock-the adjacent (next lower) bit can't be written by the software.
